text: Phira‘a'una balala, ‘ki! Ami tomaderake anumati deyara age'i tomara tara prati bisbasa karale? Se-i to tomadera pradhana ye tomaderake jadu siksa diyeche. Sutaram sighra'i tomara era parinama janabe. Ami abasya'i tomadera hata ebam tomadera pa biparita dika theke kete phelaba ebam tomadera saba'ike sulabid'dha karaba'i.’
